GUESTPOLICES.TITLE: Any questions?
GUESTPOLICES.CONTENT: We are always happy to hear from you - let us know if you have any questions or suggestions at {{Restaurant.Email}}.

RESTAURANTPOLICES.TITLE: Any questions?
RESTAURANTPOLICES.CONTENT: We are always happy to hear from you - let us know if you have any questions or suggestions at support@hostmeapp.com.

PROMO.TITLE: Manage your reservations anytime and anywhere!
PROMO.CONTENT: With our apps, you can discover, reserve, and manage restaurant reservations — anytime, anywhere.
